summary: Yet another follower mod. Adds in Merlin, a wizard follower. He thinks he's a dragon, is quite overpowered, and you probably can marry him.
descriptionHtml:
Yet another follower mod. Adds in The Great Druid Merlin, a wizard follower. He thinks he's a dragon (has limited shouts), is quite overpowered (level 50 with 1000 MP), and you probably can marry him (relationship is lover). That's truly all there is to this follower.

Relies on Apocalypse spell mod pack, The Eyes Of Beauty, and More Hair Colors.

If you don't have these mods, don't get mad at me if he doesn't look... right. :D Also, there will be no updates.

First mod. If anyone has tips for improvement, I'm very willing to learn.

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16225
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14713

Relies on Apocalypse spell mod pack, The Eyes Of Beauty, and More Hair Colors.

[b]He can be found in Riverwood's inn, The Sleeping Giant.[/b]
author: Daniel Shakoa
